results.title: The Impact
results.creator_credit: Ross Onley-Zerkel and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Ross tells of the traumatic experience of being the victim of a drink driving car crash and the repercussions that event has had on his life thereafter.
results.description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Ross tells of the traumatic experience of being the victim of a drink driving car crash and the repercussions that event has had on his life thereafter.

results.title: Hopes and Dreams
results.creator_credit: Alex Litsoudis and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Alex tells of a horrifying abuse he suffered in his childhood that resulted in permanent effects on his life. Following his passion for drama, Alex co-founded the ‘Ability Bunch’.
results.description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Alex tells of a horrifying abuse he suffered in his childhood that resulted in permanent effects on his life. Following his passion for drama, Alex co-founded the ‘Ability Bunch’.
description_for_label: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. results.title: Going to Nan & Pop's Farm
results.creator_credit: Candice Jones and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Candice recounts the fond memories of visiting her grandparents’ flower farm. This story is told with animated illustrations, photographs and video footage.
results.description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. results.title: Going to my mum's house
results.creator_credit: Debbie Lissek and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Debbie lives in a hostel, but spends weekends at her mum’s house. In this story, Debbie gives an outline of the activities she and her mum routinely enjoy on the weekends.
results.description: Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’. Debbie lives in a hostel, but spends weekends at her mum’s house. In this story, Debbie gives an outline of the activities she and her mum routinely enjoy on the weekends.

results.title: The Crying Game
results.creator_credit: John Wood and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description:
A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
This story made by John Wood talks about his uncontrallable bouts of crying. This is sometimes brought about by depression or anxiety. He has learned that the expression of emotion is very healthy.
results.description:
A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
This story made by John Wood talks about his uncontrallable bouts of crying. This is sometimes brought about by depression or anxiety. He has learned that the expression of emotion is very healthy.
description_for_label:
A personal account created by a participant in the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop Telling Tales. Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for Telling Tales.
This story made by John Wood talks about his uncontrallable bouts of crying. This is sometimes brought about by depression or anxiety. He has learned that the expression of emotion is very healthy.

results.title: The Brown dressing gown
results.brief_description: Patric fondly remembers his social worker Julie Wilson who helped him come out of his cocoon and discard his brown dressing gown. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Department of Human Services and The Deafness Foundation.

results.title: Birth without knives
results.brief_description:
Please note: This film contains footage of a home birth, including nudity.

Created by ‘Asphyxia’, this film talks about the concerns regarding pregnancy, avoiding a caesarean birth and having a home birth.

Produced in partnership with Arts Access and supported by the Department of Human Services and the Deafness Foundation for the ACMI Digital Storytelling Workshop ‘Telling Tales’.
results.description:

Created by ‘Asphyxia’, this film talks about the concerns regarding pregnancy, avoiding a caesarean birth and having a home birth.

results.title: Brewing up a fairytale
results.creator_credit: Christine Evely and Glenferrie Primary School
results.brief_description: From the ACMI Primary School Program “Brewing up a new Tale: a live action production workshop” for lower primary. Students interact with Green Screen Technology and fairytale sets to learn the basics of narrative contruction, genre and and scene.
